items.title: SRCC OCR Digitization
items.tagline: Hybrid OCR pipeline for 50K+ student records
items.description: Developed a hybrid OCR pipeline (Tesseract, TrOCR, CRAFT, Google Vision, Azure Document AI) to extract structured fields from handwritten admission forms. Reduced manual entry time from 18 months to 3 months with 95% accuracy.
items.rpgDescription: "An arcane scroll of automation, forged in the fires of AI and OCR magic. Capable of transmuting 50,000 handwritten forms into pure digital gold."

items.title: QS-GRC Platform
items.description: Designed a modular GRC product combining ITAM, DLP, patch management, risk scoring, SIEM-like alerts, and DPDP-aligned compliance features. Achieved 90% reduction in manual compliance effort during pilot runs.
items.rpgDescription: "A mighty shield of compliance, enchanted with RBAC wards and risk-detecting runes. Reduces the burden of governance by 90%."

items.title: Enkay Enviro CMS
items.description: Solo-developed a customizable CMS and client portal for a 30+ year environmental consultancy with 1000+ projects. Role-based access, media library, and project documentation workflows with 70% reduced content-update latency.
items.rpgDescription: "A grimoire of content mastery, blessed with 30 years of environmental wisdom. Grants the power to manage 1000+ sacred scrolls."

items.title: Apna Agri Store
items.description: Built a MERN-based marketplace with inventory and transaction systems, onboarding 500+ farmers. Features UPI/Stripe payments, SMS notifications, and price-forecasting models for farmer decision-making.
items.rpgDescription: "A harvest blessing that connects 500 farmers to the realm. Features payment enchantments and price-foresight spells."

items.title: NeurQ AI Labs
items.description: Research lab and product studio focused on applied AI solutions. From natural language processing to computer vision, developing technology that solves real problems across industries.
items.rpgDescription: "The sanctum of artificial intelligence, where neural networks are born. 15+ models trained, 3 papers written, 5 products deployed."

items.title: The NBATech
items.description: Full-service technology platform delivering ORMS (revenue monitoring for UP state), Arth Pay (merchant QR-payments with 15,000+ installs), and S3 Farmer App. Serving enterprises and government at scale.
items.rpgDescription: "The ultimate tech arsenal â€” ORMS for state revenue, Arth Pay for 15K+ merchants, S3 for farmers. Government-grade power."
